characters.name: Dok-Ja Kim
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm

He is the sole reader of the webnovel Three Ways to Survive in a Ruined World (AKA 'Ways of Survival'), an apocalyptic fantasy story written by tls123.

characters.name: Jung-Hyeok Yu
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184 cm

Yoo Joonghyuk is the main character of tls123's novel Three Ways to Survive in a Ruined World.

~!Throughout Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint, he is seen in his 1863rd, 1864th (believed to be his 3rd), and 1865th regressions.!~

characters.name: Su-Yeong Han
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm

Han Su-Yeong is first shown to have a selfish personality, prioritizing her own interests over anything else. However, throughout the story she grows closer to the members of , gradually coming to  value each of them. Han Su-Yeong is a very confident, intelligent, and witty person, constantly insulting and joking around with her companions, but she gets angry very easily when others do stupid things. Similar to [Yu Jung-Hyeok](https://anilist.co/character/180892/), she will berate the people she cares about even as she tries her hardest to keep them safe. When [Kim Dok-Ja](https://anilist.co/character/180887/) is absent, Han Su-Yeong is the de facto leader of , using her astounding intelligence to guide them through any hardships that may come their way.

characters.name: Sang-Ah Yoo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 166 cm

Yoo Sang-Ah is one of Kim Dok-Ja's colleagues and current party members. She is described as being Mino Soft's beauty, with a gentle and lively look about her. While her expression is normally smiley, it becomes somewhat cold when she is thinking.
~!Instead of a single Constellation, Yoo Sangah is sponsored by the entirety of the "Olympus" nebula. She is therefore able to access multiple stigmas and powers, granted by the various Constellations within the nebula.!~

characters.name: Uriel
characters.description:
Demon-like Judge of Fire is a constellation of the  nebula who makes judgments through fire. Their real identity is the Archangel Uriel. Their contractor must only perform acts of "absolute good." In return, they gain enormous power.

She is one of the original 4 constellations who wishes to sponsor Kim Dokja. Despite being rejected, she is an avid supporter of .

~!It is later revealed that the Uriel of the 999th turn was one of Yoo Joonghyuk's companions and fought with his team to reach The End.!~

characters.name: Jecheon Daeseong
alt_names: Great Sage the Equal of Heaven
characters.description: The Great Sage, Heaven's Equal, also known as the Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, is one of the "story bodies" i.e. versions of Sun Wukong. ~!He offered to sponsor Kim Dokja during the first Sponsor Selection, and has remained one of his staunch supporters since, eventually helping accept him as the fifth story body of Sun Wukong.!~

characters.name: Seol-Hwa Lee
characters.description: Lee Seol-Hwa is one of the 10 Evils, the Poisoner. She was Yoo Jong-Hyuk's companion in his second round.

characters.name: Nam-Un Kim
characters.description:
Kim Nam-Un is a side character in Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint. He was one of Yoo Joonghyuk's companions in Three Ways to Survive in a Ruined World.
~!He dies at the beginning of the story as he is eliminated in the last moment by Kim Dokja.!~

characters.name: Bihyeong
characters.description:
Bihyung is the dokkaebi in charge of Kim Dokja's scenario. Kim Dokja makes several deals with Bihyung.

He is the creator of the 'Random Item Box'. He was fired from the Star Stream Administration Bureau after the product was forced to be banned by the bureau and became a streamer.

characters.name: Simyeonui Heugyeomnyong
characters.description:
The Abyssal Black Flame Dragon is a constellation and the leader of the  group. He offered to sponsor Kim Dokja in the first Sponsor Selection, but was turned down. Despite being snubbed, he followed Kim Dokja through the scenarios and became a strong supporter of his nebula.

~!In all other rounds in WoS, he chose Kim Namwoon as his incarnation. In this 3rd round, Han Sooyoung chooses him as a sponsor. He comes to the aid of  several times through the story, and is a candidate for the Apocalypse Dragon.!~

characters.name: Hyun-Sung Lee
characters.description: Lee Hyunsung is a former army lieutenant and a current member of Kim Dokja's party. He was originally a character in Ways of Survival, fighting under Yoo Joonghyuk's leadership.

characters.name: Hee-Won Jung
characters.description: Jung Heewon is a member of Kim Dokja's party. She was part of the marginalized group from Geumho station. She becomes one of the most vital party members, sometimes referred to as the "sword" of the group.

characters.name: Gil-Young Lee
characters.description: Gil-Young is a young boy who is a member of Kim Dok-Ja's party. He had the insects that allowed some of the party to survive Main Scenario 1. He is not a character from the original novel.

characters.name: Ji-Hye Lee
characters.description: Lee Ji-Hye is an ex-high school student and a current member of Kim Dokja's Company. She was originally a character in Ways of Survival, fighting under Yoo Joong-Hyuk's leadership.

characters.name: Secretive Plotter
characters.description:
He's one of few constellation that showed interest in Kim Dokja since the start of the scenarios.

~! Later, it is revealed that he is actually [Yoo Joong-Hyuk](https://anilist.co/character/180892/JungHyeok-Yu), the protagonist of the original Ways of Survival, from after the end of the novel. After completing 1863 regressions, he travelled to another world line which contained Kim Dokja's world, watching over it since the beginning of the scenarios. !~

characters.name: Yoo-Sung Shin
characters.description: Shin Yoosung is one of Kim Dokja's and Yoo Joonghyuk's party members, and Kim Dokja's sponsored Incarnation. She is a character from the original Ways of Survival, and the child whose 41st round adult self appeared in Main Scenario 5 as the Disaster of Floods.

characters.name: The Oldest Dream
characters.description: ~!The Oldest Dream is the constellation sponsor of Yoo Joonghyuk, the protagonist of Ways of Survival. He provides Yoo Joonghyuk with the ability to regress in time, kickstarting the plot of the webnovel.!~ ~!The Oldest Dream's true identity is that of a significantly younger Kim Dokja, whose love for Ways of Survival created an entire set of world lines where it was a reality.!~

characters.name: Hades
alt_names: Father of The Rich Night ‚ Ruler of The Underworld‚ King of the Underworld
characters.description:
The Father of the Rich Night is the constellation Hades, one of the head gods of Olympus and ruler of the underworld.

~!During the  scenario hades announces Kim Dokja as his successor!~
~!Hades later accepts Kim Dokja as his son!~

characters.name: Anna Croft
characters.description:
Anna Croft is a prophet and savior. She's an American born in Las Vegas. Her sponsor is the Asgard Nebula and her goal is to protect Earth.

To achieve her goals she is willing to do anything necessary, such as putting her companion in a dangerous position during the Gourmet Banquet scenario in hopes that Thursday's Thunder, Thor would sponsor her companion. She has betrayed Yoo Joonghyuk multiple times over his regressions.

characters.name: Mi-A Yu
characters.description: Yoo Mia is the younger sister of Yoo Joong-hyuk, the protagonist of Ways of Survival.

characters.name: Persephone
characters.description: Persephone, better known by her constellation modifier "Queen of the Darkest Spring," is the wife of Hades and queen of the Underworld. She is equal in power to Hades and can change her incarnation appearance at will.

characters.name: Nirvana Moebius
characters.description: Nirvana Moebius is the leader of the Salvation Church and a reincarnator obsessed with regressor Yoo Joonghyuk.

characters.name: Gong Pildu
characters.description: Gong Pildu is a member of  who acts as the main base defense. Formerly, he was the leader of the Landlord Alliance.
